question: Which of the following functions is not true about the President of India?
option1: Appointment of Prime Minister at his discretion when no party has a clear majority in the Lok Sabha
option2: Summoning and Prorogation of both Houses of Parliament
option3: Allocation of portfolios to ministers at his discretion
option4: Removal of chairman of a State Public Service Commission by an order
answer: Allocation of portfolios to ministers at his discretion
explanation: Third statement is incorrect because the President allots portfolios to ministers on the advice of Prime Minister.
